snippet: Pet Airways, once the great transportation hope for animal owners, is low on cash and has been canceling flights.
abstract: Pet Airways, which caters to pets, is low on cash and has been canceling flights; dog and cat owners are angry, including customers who claim they have not received refunds for booked flights.
lead_paragraph: Pet Airways, once the great transportation hope for animal owners, is low on cash and has been canceling flights.

headline.seo: Pet Airways, in Financial Straits, Is Canceling Flights
headline.main: At an Airline That Caters to Pets, the Humans Are Howling
headline.print_headline: At an Airline That Caters to Pets, the Humans Are Howling
